cases.title: Economics Expert Not Allowed to Testify on Disability Claims
cases.description: Plaintiff's Economic Expert Witness was not allowed to testify on disability claims since the expert did not have any medical training.

cases.title: Circuit Court Denies Admiralty & Maritime Expert Witness from Testifying
cases.description: Defendant's Admiralty & Maritime Expert Witness did not show that his experimental tests were substantially similar to how plaintiff used his boat.

cases.title: Finance Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Securities Fraud Case
cases.description: The court found Finance Expert Witness's "Event Study" provides an evidentiary basis for causation and damages in securities fraud case.
